title: Normal and frictional force with increasing speed

content.question: A block moving to the right on a level surface with friction is pulled by an increasing horizontal force also directed to the right. As the applied force increases, which of the following is true of the normal force and the frictional force on the block?

choices.label:
Normal Force
 Frictional Force

Increases
 Increases

Normal Force
 Frictional Force

Increases
 Remains constant

Normal Force
 Frictional Force

Remains constant
 Increases

Normal Force
 Frictional Force

Remains constant
 Decreases

Normal Force
 Frictional Force

Remains constant
 Remains constant

content.answer:
Normal Force
 Frictional Force

Remains constant
 Remains constant

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
